mapper.insert: INSERT INTO k_schedule_tbl(date_idx, flight_name, start_date, boarding_time, depart_time, arrive_time, ap_idx_d, ap_idx_a) VALUES (k_schedule_tbl_seq.nextval, #{flight_name}, #{start_date}, #{boarding_time}, #{depart_time}, #{arrive_time}, #{ap_idx_d}, #{ap_idx_a})
mapper.select: SELECT s.flight_name, s.start_date, s.boarding_time, s.depart_time, s.arrive_time, d.ap_name_d, a.ap_name_a, e.economyseat, e.economyseatprice, b.c_name, s.date_idx FROM k_flight_tbl f INNER JOIN k_economyseat_tbl e on f.flight_name = e.flight_name INNER JOIN b_corpmember_tbl b on f.c_aircode = b.c_aircode INNER JOIN k_schedule_tbl s on f.flight_name = s.flight_name INNER JOIN k_airport_tbl d on s.ap_idx_d = d.ap_idx INNER JOIN k_airport_tbl a on s.ap_idx_a = a.ap_idx WHERE s.start_date = #{start_date} and d.ap_name_d = #{ap_name_d} and a.ap_name_a = #{ap_name_a}

SELECT s.flight_name, s.start_date, s.boarding_time, s.depart_time, s.arrive_time, d.ap_name_d, a.ap_name_a, r.businessseat, r.businessseatprice, b.c_name, s.date_idx FROM k_flight_tbl f INNER JOIN k_businessseat_tbl r on f.flight_name = r.flight_name INNER JOIN b_corpmember_tbl b on f.c_aircode = b.c_aircode INNER JOIN k_schedule_tbl s on f.flight_name = s.flight_name INNER JOIN k_airport_tbl d on s.ap_idx_d = d.ap_idx INNER JOIN k_airport_tbl a on s.ap_idx_a = a.ap_idx WHERE s.start_date = #{start_date} and d.ap_name_d = #{ap_name_d} and a.ap_name_a = #{ap_name_a}

SELECT s.flight_name, s.start_date, s.boarding_time, s.depart_time, s.arrive_time, d.ap_name_d, a.ap_name_a, t.firstseat, t.firstseatprice, b.c_name, s.date_idx FROM k_flight_tbl f INNER JOIN k_firstseat_tbl t on f.flight_name = t.flight_name INNER JOIN b_corpmember_tbl b on f.c_aircode = b.c_aircode INNER JOIN k_schedule_tbl s on f.flight_name = s.flight_name INNER JOIN k_airport_tbl d on s.ap_idx_d = d.ap_idx INNER JOIN k_airport_tbl a on s.ap_idx_a = a.ap_idx WHERE s.start_date = #{start_date} and d.ap_name_d = #{ap_name_d} and a.ap_name_a = #{ap_name_a}
SELECT * FROM k_schedule_tbl s INNER JOIN k_economyseat_tbl e on s.flight_name = e.flight_name WHERE s.date_idx = #{date_idx}
SELECT * FROM k_schedule_tbl s INNER JOIN k_businessseat_tbl b on s.flight_name = b.flight_name WHERE s.date_idx = #{date_idx}
SELECT * FROM k_schedule_tbl s INNER JOIN k_firstseat_tbl f on s.flight_name = f.flight_name WHERE s.date_idx = #{date_idx}

SELECT s.flight_name, s.start_date, s.boarding_time, s.depart_time, s.arrive_time, d.ap_name_d, a.ap_name_a, t.firstseat, t.firstseatprice, r.businessseat, r.businessseatprice, e.economyseat, e.economyseatprice, b.c_name, s.date_idx FROM k_flight_tbl f INNER JOIN k_firstseat_tbl t on f.flight_name = t.flight_name INNER JOIN k_businessseat_tbl r on f.flight_name = r.flight_name INNER JOIN k_economyseat_tbl e on f.flight_name = e.flight_name INNER JOIN b_corpmember_tbl b on f.c_aircode = b.c_aircode INNER JOIN k_schedule_tbl s on f.flight_name = s.flight_name INNER JOIN k_airport_tbl d on s.ap_idx_d = d.ap_idx INNER JOIN k_airport_tbl a on s.ap_idx_a = a.ap_idx WHERE s.date_idx = #{date_idx}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO k_reservation_tbl(reservation_idx, date_idx, flight_name, m_idx, ticket_date, ticket_price, seat_name, passport_num) VALUES (#{reservation_idx}, #{date_idx}, #{flight_name}, #{m_idx}, sysdate, #{ticket_price}, #{seat_name}, #{passport_num})
mapper.select: SELECT p.m_name, p.m_gender, f.flight_name, s.start_date, s.boarding_time, s.depart_time, s.arrive_time, d.ap_name_d, a.ap_name_a, r.reservation_idx, r.seat_name FROM k_reservation_tbl r INNER JOIN b_publicmember_tbl p ON r.m_idx = p.m_idx INNER JOIN k_flight_tbl f ON r.flight_name = f.flight_name INNER JOIN k_schedule_tbl s ON r.date_idx = s.date_idx INNER JOIN k_airport_tbl d ON s.ap_idx_d = d.ap_idx INNER JOIN k_airport_tbl a ON s.ap_idx_a = a.ap_idx WHERE r.reservation_idx = #{reservation_idx}
SELECT reservation_idx FROM k_reservation_tbl WHERE date_idx=#{date_idx} and m_idx=#{m_idx}

SELECT p.m_name, p.m_gender, f.flight_name, s.start_date, s.boarding_time, s.depart_time, s.arrive_time, d.ap_name_d, a.ap_name_a, r.reservation_idx, r.seat_name FROM k_reservation_tbl r INNER JOIN b_publicmember_tbl p ON r.m_idx = p.m_idx INNER JOIN k_flight_tbl f ON r.flight_name = f.flight_name INNER JOIN k_schedule_tbl s ON r.date_idx = s.date_idx INNER JOIN k_airport_tbl d ON s.ap_idx_d = d.ap_idx INNER JOIN k_airport_tbl a ON s.ap_idx_a = a.ap_idx WHERE r.m_idx = #{m_idx}
